You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

I have plan to make garden in my home. I want some suggestion from you.
Plum trees and pair trees would be my suggestion in the summer when they blossom they have such a lovely flower on them
IN MY HOME?! A TREE? That was not at all what I was thinking. Do they grow well indoors? I am intrigued. 
Well if you want to make it like a proper garden experience then I would suggest going all in, and go for the best most authentic looking items you could get 
Wow! Ok! This is sounding like a bigger undertaking! Should I embrace bugs in the home if they help the plants or am I getting wild?
